July 9, 2015 - (Worcester, Massachusetts) - Divorce hurts, even if you're the one who 'wants' it. If you seek a compassionate lawyer to help see you through this hurtful process, you need to call Mediation Advantage Services now. For married couples wishing to divorce peaceable, wisely and economically, divorce mediation may be the best alternative. While many attorneys may state that they offer mediation services, do they have the training and experience to make the process a success? Making certain the lawyer you choose has an extensive background in mediation can make a significant difference in the efficiency with which your divorce is settled. At the Law Office of Polly A. Tatum (Mediation Advantage Services), their domestic relations attorney is a trained professional mediator who has conducted well over 1800-2000 divorce and family law mediations since 1997. Another aspect about divorce mediation that is compelling for divorcing parties is the fact that it is far less expensive to mediate a divorce voluntarily than to hire separate lawyers and settle divorce matters in court. For more information on the financial benefits of divorce mediation, please visit our page on divorce mediation facts and costs. Settling divorce and family law matters does not have to be an adversarial or expensive process. Mediate, do not litigate â€” resolve disputes expeditiously and economically. If you and your spouse can't split in a friendly, respectful, and caring way, your kids are going to suffer, your bank account is going to suffer, and you are going to suffer. Mediation is a better idea. The law firm offers mediation services designed to help families find solutions to divorce-related conflicts in a non-combative approach. Worcester divorce mediator Polly A. Tatum acts as a third-party neutral mediator. Often, mediation is a less-costly alternative to a prolonged courtroom battle. In some cases, however, a formal lawsuit might be the only way to effectively resolve a family law dispute. In addition to offering mediation services, Polly A. Tatum also represents clients as their attorney in contested divorces and guardianship disputes. She is highly skilled in family law, prepared to advocate in her clients' best interests or act as a neutral third party.
